name: Kintamani ATV
address: Jl. Tabu, Songan A, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1: It was great! Thank you very much for this unforgettable experience! Our guide was super professional! It was my first time riding Atv and our guide helped me with everything to make this experience as the best) It was like riding on a moon (never been there, but I think it is like this)! Thank you, guys!
review 2:
I had the best ATV experience here!
The ATV is in good condition.
The tour guide is so good at what he's doing.
The view is sooo BEAUTIFUL 10/10.
The staff are so humble and helpful. I booked 2 ATVs at 9AM, but for some reason, I couldn't come on time. Then they asked me if they could help me reschedule or even help me with my car problem.

I would definitely recommend this place to everyone, and I would definitely come back again
review 3: Best experience in Bali I love the activities plus  the service &  Guidance by guy over there was great I will came again in future ðŸ˜Š
review 4: It was a wonderful experience with polite and capable staff, the view was mesmerising also all together a different out of world experience
review 5: amazing mount and trek, its such amazing exprience with friendly guide Joe, he cares me from the start untill finish, and the views are so beautifull, recomendedâœ…

name: Mount Batur Sunrise And Breakfat on the top
address: Jl. Tabu, Songan A, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1:
This review is limited to sunrise on Mount Batur and not the trek to the summit.
There are a lot of transports to take you to the view point once booked through tours kiosk. The tour guide arranges transport from your location to the base camp & jeep from base camp to sunrise point. Getting to this place takes about an hour from Ubud. And since it's sunrise make sure to wake up extra early to make it in time.
Getting from base camp to sunrise point with jeep is an adventure of its own, get a lot of neck support if need beðŸ˜…
The sunrise it itself is beautiful, the viewpoint also overlooks the huge lake and you can see small peaks of Mt. Agung from this location.
You also get a breakfast with this tour!!
